itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 13, 2013
teaser: The short-message social media company Twitter wants to sell many little slices of itself to the public.  It announced its IPO idea in a tweet, of course. And as we approach the fifth anniversary of the day Lehman Brothers went bust, a look at the continuing global effects of the financial crash.
description: The short-message social media company Twitter wants to sell many little slices of itself to the public.  It announced its IPO idea in a tweet, of course. And as we approach the fifth anniversary of the day Lehman Brothers went bust, a look at the continuing global effects of the financial crash.
byline: Bruce Johnson, David Brancaccio, Christopher Werth, Sally Herships, Mark Garrison, Sam Beard and David Weinberg
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 13, 2013
